category.name: General
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: VIS_LAUNCH_LOGIN_PROMPT
preference.preference_description: Indicates if the user needs to login when launching the standalone viewer from Teamcenter unless TcSS (Single Sign On) is enabled. It is recommended to keep this preference set to true. Valid Values: *true: Users need to identify. If TcSS (Single Sign On) is enabled, no identification is required. This is the default value. *false: Users do not need to identify.
